name: Timur Rakhimov
description: Timur is a leading AI engineer specializing in natural language processing and intelligent automation for financial systems.

events.title: AI and Finance Integration
events.description: A session exploring the role of artificial intelligence in transforming the financial sector.

events.title: Ethical AI Development
events.description: Panel discussion on creating fair, transparent, and accountable AI systems.

name: Isabella Grigorieva
quote: Data tells the story of progress.
description: Isabella leads Agrobank’s data science division, focusing on predictive modeling for agricultural finance and risk management.

events.title: Big Data in AgriTech
events.description: How data-driven solutions are improving crop yields and financial inclusion in rural areas.

name: Asal Shodmonova
quote: The future of finance is inclusive.
description: Asal is an award-winning fintech entrepreneur developing mobile payment platforms that empower small businesses.

events.title: Women in Fintech
events.description: An inspiring session on leadership and innovation in the fintech space.

events.title: Scaling Startups
events.description: Practical insights on how to grow fintech startups in emerging markets.

name: Murat Karimov
quote: Technology is the bridge between vision and reality.
description: Murat oversees technological strategy at FinLabs, focusing on cloud-based solutions for banking and digital wallets.

events.title: Cloud Finance Revolution
events.description: Exploring the advantages and challenges of cloud adoption in financial institutions.

name: Sardor Akhmedov
description: Sardor specializes in strategic planning for digital payment ecosystems and cross-border remittance networks.

events.title: Digital Payments in Central Asia
events.description: Understanding payment infrastructure and regional interoperability challenges.

name: Olga Petrova
quote: Trust is the currency of technology.
description: Olga leads blockchain-based research projects exploring decentralized finance and digital identity management.

events.title: Blockchain and Trust
events.description: Panel on how blockchain redefines transparency and accountability in finance.

name: Jamila Umarova
description: Jamila provides data-driven insights to guide investment strategies for major banking institutions in Uzbekistan.

events.title: Risk Analysis Workshop
events.description: Comprehensive look at quantitative models used in modern financial risk assessment.

name: Rashidov Aziz
quote: Sustainable growth begins with informed policy.
description: Aziz is an international economist focusing on emerging markets, fiscal policy, and sustainable finance.

events.title: Global Market Forecasts
events.description: Economic outlook for 2025–2026 with focus on Central Asian markets.

name: Nargiza Usmanova
description: Nargiza founded DigitalPay to deliver accessible digital payment solutions for micro and small enterprises.

events.title: Entrepreneurship in Fintech
events.description: Fireside chat about launching and scaling financial startups.

name: Timur Valiev
description: Timur designs machine learning systems for fraud detection and credit risk evaluation in digital banks.

events.title: AI in Credit Risk
events.description: Technical deep-dive into neural models for automated credit scoring.

name: Dilshod Yuldashev
description: Dilshod has two decades of experience managing corporate finance, mergers, and investments across Asia.

events.title: Financial Leadership
events.description: Discussion on modern CFO responsibilities in fast-evolving fintech companies.

name: Kamola Rakhimova
quote: Innovation thrives where curiosity meets courage.
description: Kamola directs innovation strategy at UzFinTech, fostering new digital banking technologies for emerging markets.

events.title: Innovating for Inclusion
events.description: Session exploring how innovation can drive inclusive finance ecosystems.
